choices.text: Neuroscientists find that reading computer code heavily involves language processing areas of the brain, and is therefore similar to a language
A study of the most distant known object in the universe, galaxy GN-z11, which is 13.4 billion light years from Earth, contains heavier elements, which means there are older galaxies still.
Astronomers report the first possible radio signal coming from an exoplanet.
